pages.text: Sometimes you might find yourself lost with the space of your $(thing)inventory$(), having sky-high stacks of blocks and items cluttering your backpack and slowing you down.$(br)Some $(thing)natural items$() might be able to be placed directly on arms, waist and chest as $(item)Baubles$(). If an item has this functionality, it will display in its tooltip the parts of the body that it can reside on.
